title: Did Donald Trump say that he believed that the United Kingdom had "different names "?
subtitle: President Trump made a comment during an interview with British media character Pierce Morgan suggesting that he believed terms such as "U.K." and "England" were interchangeable.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: US President Donald Trump told Prime Minister Theresa May that he believed that the terms "United Kingdom," "English" and "Great Britain" could be used interchangeably.
